title: Kingdom of Shadows
description: Aladdin and Cassian must fight for their lives against Gothel's dark creations, but even if they survive, the entire kingdom is at risk of falling into her hands. As a dark shadow descends on the world, Kyra seeks the only wish she's ever wanted for herself, while Rapunzel learns what it will take to rule in her father's place.This is the epic conclusion to the trilogy!
author: Caroline Peckham
